title: Kowai Kurai Ataru kara...
original_name: 怖いくらい当たるから・・・
sinopse:
1. Tsumi no Meikyuu
   A circle of sin, where a bit of mischief that lead to suicide happened over and over again.

2. Kowai Kurai Ataru kara ...
   There are a fortune teller whose fortune telling is always true.

3. Otonagari: Yoru wa Kodomo no Jikan
   A story about three kids who always hanging out together every night for one hour.

4. Aitai ...
   I feel that someone extremely important is going to visit someday. I've to prepare everything.
